root.name: Metal Fight Beyblade DS
root.description: Metal Fight Beyblade is a Beypoint Reader. This device goes into the GBA slot acts as an adapter that connects the Nintendo DS game to a Beypointer. A Beypointer is a device that keeps track of your top spinning Beyblade stats in real life also in the Nintendo DS game.Release date: Japan March 26, 2009.BeyPointer at the bottom right hand side.
